DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare recurrence endometriotic cyst patient take Dienogest Microgynon conservative surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Use Dienogest Combined Oral Contraceptive Pills ( Microgynon ) Reduce Risk Recurrence Endometriotic Cyst After Conservative Surgery
DOC.criteria: Good general health Older age legal consent ( i.e . 18 year old ) Sonographic diagnosis ovarian endometrioma diameter least 4cm 2 separate scan least 6 week apart No contraindication use progesterone combine oral contraceptive pill Not attempt conceive either time study entry least 2 year surgery Willing able participate study explain Operative finding suggestive endometriotic cyst Contraindications progestogens oral contraceptive pill Unwillingness tolerate menstrual irregularity Planning pregnancy within 2 year study Can understand English , Cantonese Putonghua
